mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE prdNo = #{prdNo} AND memId = #{memId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(memId, prdNo, cartQty) VALUES(#{memId}, #{prdNo}, #{cartQty})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartNo, p.prdNo, p.prdImg, p.prdName, p.prdPrice, c.cartQty, c.memId FROM product p, cart c WHERE p.prdNo=c.prdNo AND memId=#{memId} ORDER BY c.cartNo
